author: Ted Byrne
content: Does this place straddle an alleyway? Whoa! I cannot imagine the engineering imagination that allows this substantial city home to rise above its space. I wonder at how they've insulated the sound of traffic moving through that tunnel. This is a wonderful find Andreas, and with those splashes of color... intriguingly presented. People and their nests are so emotionally powerful parts of culture. And culture trumps everything.
